What are some key features of Verus that enable the creation and launch of new blockchains, crowdfunding currency launches, and an interoperable multichain network?

Verus offers several features that facilitate the creation and launch of new blockchains, crowdfunding currency launches, and an interoperable multichain network. These features include:

**Simultaneous Blockchain and Blockchain Liquidity Pool Launches:** 
Verus allows for the simultaneous launch of a new blockchain and a fully decentralized or centralized bridge converter liquidity pool. This bridge converter liquidity pool enables seamless connectivity between the new blockchain and other blockchains, with all fees generated through cross-chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool earned on the new blockchain.

**Blockchain-Based Crowdfunding Currency Launches:** 
Verus enables the launch of crowdfunding currencies with minimum participation or automatic refunds, including for dual launches (blockchain and bridge). This feature allows users to set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in their preferred currencies on the chain. If the minimum participation levels are not met by the start time of the blockchain, all participants will automatically receive a refund of all their pre-conversions, less network fees. The launch options also provide for maximum participation in one or more currencies, pre-launch discounts, price-neutral pre-allocations to select IDs, and pre-launch discounts for early participants.

**Interoperable Multichain Network:** 
The Verus multichain network enables the creation of an unlimited number of interoperable blockchains. Notary IDs, specified at chain definition, provide decentralized blockchain-specific bridge confirmation, allowing public blockchains to be available for merge mining and staking. This feature enables unlimited scale and new use cases for blockchain technology.

These features make Verus an attractive platform for users looking to create and launch new blockchains, crowdfunding currency launches, and an interoperable multichain network.

### Simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches
- Launch of a world class, worldwide, merge-mineable blockchain along with a fully decentralized or centralized “bridge” converter liquidity pool as part of defining a new blockchain. Bridge converter currencies have the same flexibility as other fractional 100% asset backed or partially asset backed currencies, but is bound to the launch of the new blockchain, runs on the new blockchain, and all fees generated via cross chain fee conversions or general use of the liquidity pool are earned on the new blockchain with no rent going back to the Verus blockchain, only seamless connectivity.
### Blockchain-based, crowdfunding currency launches with minimum participation or automatic refunds, including for dual launches (blockchain and bridge)
- Set required minimum levels of worldwide participation in your preferred currencies on chain. If by the start time of your blockchain, minimums are not met, all participants will automatically get a refund of all of their pre-conversions, less the network fees. The launch options also provide for maximum participation in one or more currencies, pre-launch discounts, price neutral pre-allocations to select IDs that increase the fractional reserve ratio to issue currencies, similarly price neutral carve-outs of proceeds, and pre-launch discounts for early participants. Using VerusIDs, launches can also include vesting schedules in the pre-allocations as well.
### An interoperable, multichain network for new use cases and unlimited scale**
- The Verus multi-currency, multi-chain network allows the creation of an unlimited number of interoperable blockchains in the Verus network.
